statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); cd "$cwd" 2>/dev/null; branch=$(git branch --no-color 2>/dev/null | sed -n 's/^\* //p' || true); if [ -n "$branch" ]; then printf '\033[34m%s@%s\033[0m \033[36m%s\033[0m \033[32m(git:%s)\033[0m' "$(whoami)" "$(hostname -s)" "$(basename "$cwd")" "$branch"; else printf '\033[34m%s@%s\033[0m \033[36m%s\033[0m' "$(whoami)" "$(hostname -s)" "$(basename "$cwd")"; fi
